name: Beettalion
description:
This game is a mix between a tower defense, and a card game all while being in VR

You will bee facing your opponent head-on in a battle of wits and luck in order to rule the hive!

Honey is the currency for all your actions, like drawing and playing cards, so using your honey wisely is the key to victory!

Do you build your base and save up strong attacking cards, or do you go on an all-out attack in order to secure a quick and decisive victory, the choice is yours!
